name: The Block (GoldenDarts Studio)
description:
After an unknown accident wipes out almost all  of those over the age of 20. The children who are left, are forced to scavenge for parts to survive. Until one day a newcomer arrives at the camp and things begin to change.

Explore the story of a gang of kids who battle the scrap heap to reclaim the playful youth that they have lost. Based on the philosophy and artwork of Lina Bo Bardi, this visual novel explores characters beaten down by the loss of childhood and the struggles they face to survive and rescue those who have been left behind.  Collect items and meet a diverse and interesting gang of children as you live through this visual novel.

Available for anyone and everyone to play.
